title: Trying to post
body: This is just to make sure I can post with this RP smurf

replies.body: It looks like your profile has sync'd and is showing as level 7.  I believe some areas of the boards require higher levels to post, but not all!  Let me know if you have any issues posting!

This character is level 7 and I am still unable to post on the Role Playing boards. Mainly, this is just to hope for a system check, or, if possible, a Rioter can see this and update my account.

Which ever happens, I am very truly thankful for assistance. Happy battles everyone.
